title: Time to Vote! Choose the next THROPIC cause - August
body:
Thropic Community - vote below to decide which non-profit will receive the funds we raise this month. The non-profit with the most votes by 8/31/21 will receive a percentage of the funds in our charity wallet. This is YOUR time to make a difference!

Learn more about our featured charities below:

Crossover Basketball India

Crossover Basketball India is the first non-profit international education program in India to leverage athletic values and skill as a means to develop academic opportunities for Indian students.

Learn more about Crossover here: https://www.crossover-india.org/

FamilyAid Boston

FamilyAid Boston is the leading provider of solutions to family homelessness in Greater Boston, empowering parents and caregivers facing homelessness to secure and sustain housing and build strong foundations for their children’s futures.

Learn more about FamilyAid Boston here: https://familyaidboston.org/our-work/

Harlem Lacrosse

Harlem Lacrosse is a school-based non-profit organization that changes the life trajectories of youth through daily wrap-around academic support, mentoring, leadership training, college readiness, career exploration, admissions counseling and lacrosse instruction.

Learn more about Harlem Lacrosse here: https://www.harlemlacrosse.org/impact

International Rescue Committee

IRC provides emergency aid and long-term assistance to refugees and those displaced by war, persecution, or natural disaster. In recent months, the IRC has provided emergency reception and processing support to hundreds of Afghan Special Immigrants who were evacuated due to the Taliban takeover in Kabul.

Learn more about IRC here: https://www.rescue.org/
author: 0x6f4113665903BD5273638ac020e3C4d5876BfAB7
